features.dont_remember_your_password_enter_your_e: Don't remember your password? Enter your email address below.
features.thank_you_within_a_few_minutes_you: Thank you, within a few minutes you will receive an e-mail containing a personal link. The link will allow you to enter a new password.
features.your_password_has_been_reset_you_can: Your password has been reset. You can now sign in with your new password.

core.one_or_more_fields_are_invalid_please: One or more fields are invalid. Please correct them in order to continue.
